book-server-disabled.bucket-comment: The bucket name is suffixed with -live or -staging depending on the branch.
book-server-disabled.configs-comment: All configs are relative to the _configs folder.

media-disabled.branches-comment: Only live and staging branches will trigger these syncs. This is not configurable.
media-disabled.cloudfront-comment: The CloudFront ID is used to invalidate the cache after deployment.

syncs.bucket-comment: The bucket name is suffixed with -live or -staging depending on the branch.

vercel-comment: Vercel deployments are disabled for this public repo because triggers have been intentionally revoked.

ftp-ssh-disabled.configs-comment: All configs are relative to the _configs folder.
